title: Kevin Coello (Special Guest) - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 191
description:
Kevin Coello joins us to discuss who should play the next Batman, dealing with celebrity deaths, KF studios, and whether or not pizza is overrated. (Released first to Patreon Supporters on 07.28.17)

Thanks to Beach Body for sponsoring this episode. Text Greggy to 303030
